content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help.

World Nomads is a great option, and it's always a good idea to consider recommendations from friends or fellow travelers. They often have valuable insights and experiences to share.

Remember to carefully review the policy terms, conditions, and coverage limits to ensure you understand what's included and what's not. It's also essential to check the provider's reputation, customer service, and claims process.

If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask. I'm here to help.

Safe travels to Japan, and I hope you have an amazing time exploring this incredible country!

(P.S. Don't forget to try some delicious Japanese food, like sushi, ramen, or okonomiyaki, and take plenty of photos to share with Sarah and your friends back home!)
